data.title: Agricultural Technical Institute of Florence
data.text:
On 23 April 2024, former MEP and Prime Minister of Finland Anneli Jäätteenmäki delivered a lecture to the Agricultural Technical Institute of Florence at the HAEU premises, as part of the educational programme with a focus on the European citizenship topic.

About the educational programme of the HAEU

The EU Historical Archives offers tailored educational programmes designed for students of all ages, aiming to introduce them to important topics related to European integration history and current EU institution developments through original archival sources. The programme encourages interactive reflection, discussion, and learning on European issues, democracy, and citizenship.

The HAEU educational programme is organized in collaboration with FMA, the Former Member Association of the European Parliament. Former MEPs share their experiences in European politics and views on the EU with Florentine and European students.

The topic of this scholar year

The educational programme for the 2023/2024 school year focuses on the European citizenship topic.
